item.title: Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP ‘Photo Mode’ update now available for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/lollipop-chainsaw-repop-photo-mode-update-now-available-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch versions to follow.

Dragami Games has released the latest update for Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC, which adds a “Photo Mode” and “Goth Outfit” costume. The PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch versions of the update will launch “as soon as they are ready.”

Get the details below.

■ PlayStation 5 / Xbox Series X|S / Steam

Major Items Included in the Latest Update

  1. Additional Function
    • Added Photo Mode – You can enter photo mode by pressing the help buttons (“View Button,” “Touch Pad Button,” “− Button”) while in-game.
  2. Bug Fixes
    • Fixed an issue where zombies would chase at unnatural times in some areas of Stage 0.
    • Fixed an issue where Nick would appear on the game over screen in Stage 0.
    • Fixed an issue where the volume of some of Nick’s voices was loud in the Stage 1 fight against Zed.
    • Fixed a graphic issue with the chainsaw model when acquiring the chainsaw dash in Stage 1.
    • Fixed an issue where voices would overlap in the Stage 3 combine minigame.
    • Fixed an issue where the How-to screen would not open during the Stage 3 combine minigame.
    • Fixed an issue where BGM was overlapping in the Stage 4 fight against Georgie.
    • Fixed an issue where Nick tickets would disappear in the Stage 4 fight against Georgie.
    • Fixed an issue where it was possible to climb onto open windows in the building climbing minigame in Stage 4.
    • Fixed an issue in Stage 5 where the currently selected chainsaw was not reflected during the event.
    • Fixed a bug where subtitles were not displayed for some audio.
    • Fixed an issue where the background music would not switch properly after listening to a telephone message while in-game.
  3. Other Updates
    • Added the ability to display English subtitles with Japanese audio.
    • Added new costume “Goth Outfit.”

■ Notice Regarding Other Platforms

For the following platforms, distribution will be made as soon as they are ready. We will notify you again when it is distributed.

  • PlayStation 4 / Xbox One / Switch / DLsite

Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.
